mapper.sql: id, bug_title, bug_no,project_id, demand_id, task_id, designated_id, version_id, bug_type, case_terminal, case_environment, bug_level, bug_status, create_user_id, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as end_time, modify_user_id, DATE_FORMAT(modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as modify_time, del_flag, steps_reproduce, DATE_FORMAT(solve_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as solve_time, solve_program, solve_id, DATE_FORMAT(close_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as close_time, close_id, serious_degree, close_reason, case_id, bug_describe, close_stauts

update bug_manage
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
demand_id = #{demandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
demand1_id = #{demand1Id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

steps_reproduce = #{stepsReproduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
close_id = #{closeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

close_stauts = #{closeStauts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bug_title = #{bugTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select id,bug_no,bug_title,serious_degree,create_user_id,designated_id,solve_id,bug_status,bug_level from bug_manage where project_id=#{projectId} and designated_id=#{userId} and bug_status in(0,1)
select id,bug_no,bug_title,serious_degree,create_user_id,designated_id,solve_id,bug_status,bug_level from bug_manage order by id desc limit 1
select count(*) from bug_manage where date(create_time) = curdate() ;
select count(*) from bug_manage where date(create_time) = curdate() and bug_status='2';

select.if: select count(*) from bug_manage where bug_status='2'
select count(*) from bug_manage where bug_status in('0','1','2')
select count(*) from bug_manage where bug_status in('3','4')

mapper.select: select task_id,count(task_id) as bugCount from bug_manage where project_id=#{projectId} GROUP BY task_id
select designated_id,count(designated_id) as bugCount from bug_manage where task_id=#{taskId} GROUP BY designated_id
